Address.value: 24955 INTERSTATE 45 NORTH, THE WOODLANDS, Texas, 77380, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tetra Technologies Inc is a diversified oil and gas services company, focused on completion fluids and associated products and services, water management, frac flowback, production well testing, offshore rig cooling, and compression services. It has two reporting segments namely Completion Fluids & Products, Water & Flowback Services. The Completion Fluids & Products Division that derives majority revenue manufactures and markets clear brine fluids, additives, and associated products and services. The Water & Flowback Services Division provides onshore oil and gas operators with comprehensive water management services.
